thread.title: Rep. Maxine Waters Claims Sex Act Allegations in Trump Dossier Are "Absolutely True"
thread.title_full: Rep. Maxine Waters Claims Sex Act Allegations in Trump Dossier Are "Absolutely True"

author: Christine Rousselle
title: Rep. Maxine Waters Claims Sex Act Allegations in Trump Dossier Are "Absolutely True"
text:
Rep. Maxine Waters Claims Sex Act Allegations in Trump Dossier Are "Absolutely True" Share Share Tweet 
Speaking on MSNBC on Thursday, Rep. Maxine Waters claimed, without evidence, that the various " sex allegations " detailed in a leaked dossier published in January by BuzzFeed were "absolutely true." Waters said that other parts of the dossier may be false, but that "they have said" that the most salacious parts are indeed fact. Rep. Waters says "we already know" the Trump-Russian prostitute sex tape is “absolutely true.” Didn’t give evidence. https://t.co/CnVlzqB54j pic.twitter.com/pSZbISz5WB — Andrew Kirell (@AndrewKirell) March 9, 2017 
And a transcript: Rep. @MaxineWaters just said on MSNBC, without evidence, that the sex allegations re: Trump in the dossier are true: pic.twitter.com/d2HZKNIXiz — Sopan Deb (@SopanDeb) March 9, 2017 
Waters also said that impeachment proceedings against President Trump are "poised" and ready to go. 
No part of the blackmail dossier has been confirmed as being fact. Trump himself has called the dossier "fake news" and has denied its allegations.
